law.text:
As used in KRS 154.40-010 to 154.40-060, unless the context indicates otherwise:
"Board" means the board of directors of the Eastern Kentucky Exposition Center Corporation;
"Center" means the Eastern Kentucky Exposition Center; and
"Corporation" means the Eastern Kentucky Exposition Center Corporation.
law.history: Created 2001 Ky. Acts ch. 27, sec. 1, effective June 21, 2001.
